text: Jan de Vries (5 January 1944 â€“ 14 January 2021) was a Dutch Grand Prix motorcycle road racer. He was born in Sint Jacobiparochie, Netherlands. In 1971, he became the first Dutchman to win a F.I.M. world championship. In 1973, he won another 50 cc world championship.Jan de Vries career statistics . Motogp.com. Retrieved on 2016-07-25. He lost the 1972 world championship to Angel Nieto by the narrowest of margins. Vries died on 14 January 2021 of cardiac arrest in Purmerend, Netherlands at the age of 77. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Dutch motorcycle racers Category:Sportspeople from Friesland
title: Jan de Vries
